workshop.title: Big Data Journey: New Data Lake
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to build your New Data Lake in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Lab 100: START HERE - Provisioning
labs.description: Instructions to provision Oracle Big Data Cloud (BDC) in your Oracle Public Cloud identity domain

labs.title: Lab 200: Getting to know BDC
labs.description: This lab will help you get to know BDC.  It will use the Notebook component and show you how to use the basic features (object store, hive) you'll need as you build your New Data Lake.

labs.title: Lab 300: More BDC
labs.description: This lab will help you get to know more BDC.  It will show you how to use more key features (spark, spark sql) with your New Data Lake.

labs.title: Lab 400: OEHCS Provisioning
labs.description: This lab will show you how to provision Oracle Event Hub Cloud Service (OEHCS)

labs.title: Lab 500: OEHCS with BDC
labs.description: This lab will demonstrate how to combine OEHCS with BDC via Spark Streaming.  This can help you add real-time streaming data to your New Data Lake.

labs.title: xtra: $300 Trial Account Signup
labs.description: Instructions to sign-up for a free trial of Oracle Public Cloud services

labs.title: xtra: Employee GSE Account Request
labs.description: Oracle Employee instructions to get access to a GSE/demo.oracle.com Oracle Public Cloud demo environment

labs.title: xtra: Running Bootstrap.sh Manually
labs.description: Instructions in case you need to run Bootstrap.sh manually

labs.title: Cleanup
labs.description: Instructions to cleanup your cloud service environment.
